description: This file defines a 'Button' component using the LightningJS framework, including its template, state management, and input handling.

classes.name: Button
classes.description: A LightningJS component for a button with favorite toggle functionality.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Initializes the component's state with default values for 'isFavorited', 'favoriteText', and 'unfavoriteText'.

methods.name: input.enter
methods.description: Handles the 'enter' input event, toggling the 'isFavorited' state.
